name: flightID
description: the date corresponding to the first flight date of the overall mission

name: missionName
description: qualitative name of the mission

name: drone
description: specific drone used for the mission

name: dataType
description: what kind of data was collected by the drone? E.g. RGB, lidar, multispectral (X-bands), hyperspectral

name: scale
description: geographic scale of mission, e.g. full (island), partial, plot, other

name: gpsSource
description: source of the GPS information, whether "drone" itself or the gps hardware company, e.g. Emlid, Ibase, etc

name: sensor
description: name of sensor used. This should be the camera and/or specific lidar / hyperspectral sensor

name: resolution_cm
description: resolution of resultant orthophoto, cm

name: overlapSide
description: the percent horizontal overlap of the drone survey

name: overlapFront
description: the percent forward overlap of the drone survey

name: nFlights
description: the number of flights needed to complete each mission

name: dateFlights_ymd
description: list of the dates (yyyy-mm-dd) on which flights were made for the mission

name: pointCloud
description: binary indication if a point cloud was generated (1) or not (0)

name: dateAligned
description: flightID that this flight's point cloud was aligned to prior to creating the DSM

name: ortho
description: binary indication if an orthomosaic was made (1) or not (0)

name: launchPoint
description: name of the lab group that conducted the drone flight

name: weather
description: brief notes about the weather during the flight day(s)

name: postSoftware
description: what software and version was used for post-processing? E.g. Metashape v2.0.4

name: issues
description: any issues of note with the flight planning, execution, or post-processing

name: notes
description: other notes about this particular mission

name: contributors
description: who participated in this mission? Includes flight planning, execution, and post-processing

name: labPI
description: name of the PI whose lab conducted the drone flight for contact purposes

name: contact
description: name and email (opt) for who should be contacted regarding questions about this mission
